# Business Process Automation

Project status reports, grant milestone tracking, workload distribution, and cross-agency data exchange. These solutions automate the work around the analytical work.

::: {.callout-note title="Solutions Coming Soon"}
This part of the book will be populated as solutions are developed through the [Automation Clinic intake process](01-automation-intake.qmd). Each solution will be published as a subchapter below.

Have a business process automation problem? **[Submit it to the clinic](https://forms.gle/cmE2un2njSVPid8C9){target="_blank"}** or **[open a GitHub Issue](https://github.com/andre-inter-collab-llc/Public-Health-Automation-Clinic/issues){target="_blank"}**.
:::

## What Belongs Here

Solutions in this part address operational and administrative tasks:

- **Project status reports** generated from project management tool exports (e.g., [GanttProject](https://www.ganttproject.biz/), [OpenProject](https://www.openproject.org/))
- **Grant milestone tracking** automated from workplan data
- **Workload distribution reports** generated from task management or timesheet data
- **Cross-agency data exchange** with automated format conversion and packaging
- **Meeting preparation** with automated agenda, status summary, or slide generation
- **Email or notification automation** for recurring status updates or deadline reminders
